If they can't clear it up, there'll be another tiff.

sentences.en: It can be a bitmap ( PCX, BMP, TIFF ) or a vector graphic ( CGM, WMF ).
sentences.cn: 是位图格式 ( PCX, BMP, TIFF ) 还是向量格式 ( CGM, WMF ).

sentences.en: Please help him convert a TIFF a PDF file.

sentences.en: The TIFF format can also be saved index color bitmaps, but few do so.
sentences.cn: TIFF格式也可保存索引颜色位图, 但是很少有人这么做.

sentences.en: The TIFF format can contain compressed and uncompressed pixel data.
sentences.cn: TIFF格式可包含压缩和非压缩象素数据.

sentences.en: These new shoes are so tiff that they rub the skin off my ankles.
sentences.cn: 这双新鞋太硬,将脚踝上的皮都磨破了.

sentences.en: They patched up their tiff again.

sentences.en: TIFF: Bitmapped line drawings: use a minimum of 1000 dpi.
